pages:
{"translate":"nitdim.book.ancient.4.1","fallback":"Syx: \"Thank you, your majesty. We will proceed with the first witness, Guardian Gada. Please rise and swim before me. Guardian Hane will take the first examination. Baliff?\"

Baliff: \"Guardian Gada, do you swear upon the great lanterns above to speak"}
